contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Families Enjoy NRC Activities At Qatar Summer Festival

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation’s (QF) National Reading Campaign’s month-long event at the Doha Exhibition and Convention Centre (DECC) is well underway, with hundreds of families gathering this weekend to enjoy the festivities.

The event, which is part of the Qatar Summer Festival, saw children of all ages enjoy a series of fun-filled games and educational activities, including storytelling sessions and jigsaw puzzles.

pageContext.title: Families Enjoy NRC Activities At Qatar Summer Festival
